SEARCH
Package com.lboric.soccerdnd.models

Class PlayerStats

java.lang.Object
com.lboric.soccerdnd.models.PlayerStats
public class PlayerStats extends Object
Model representing the statistics of a player in the system.

This class contains the player's statistics such as season year and the number of goals scored. It is used for transferring player statistics data within the system and for converting to both a PlayerStatsDTO (Data Transfer Object) and a PlayerStatsEntity (for persistence).

  • Field Details

    • playerId

      private Long playerId
      The unique identifier for the player associated with these statistics. This is typically set when the player is retrieved from the system.

    • name

      private String name
      The first name of the player. This is used to identify the player along with their surname.

    • surname

      private String surname
      The last name of the player. This is used to identify the player along with their first name.

    • seasonYear

      private int seasonYear
      The season year for which the player statistics are recorded. The value represents the year of the season, typically used for historical data.

    • numberOfGoals

      private int numberOfGoals
      The number of goals scored by the player in the specified season. This represents the player’s performance in terms of scoring goals.

  • Method Details

    • toDTO

      public PlayerStatsDTO toDTO()
      Converts this PlayerStats object to a PlayerStatsDTO for data transfer.

      This method is used to prepare the statistics data for transferring via API or presenting to the client.

      Returns:
      a PlayerStatsDTO object containing the player statistics data

    • toEntity

      public PlayerStatsEntity toEntity(PlayerEntity playerEntity)
      Converts this PlayerStats object to a PlayerStatsEntity for persistence in the database.

      This method is used to convert the model into an entity suitable for storing player statistics in the database.

      Parameters:
      playerEntity - the PlayerEntity associated with the player for whom the statistics are being saved
      Returns:
      a PlayerStatsEntity representing this player’s statistics for persistence
